title: 75/456/EEC: Council Decision of 15 July 1975 on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on cane sugar
header:
23.7.1975 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 190/35
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 July 1975
on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on cane sugar
(75/456/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of India on cane sugar is hereby concluded on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is annexed to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the person empowered to sign the Agreement and to confer upon him the powers required to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1975
For the Council
The President
M. RUMOR
(1)  OJ No L 73, 27. 3. 1972, p. 195.
